newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products rally, fuel bounces in bear marke.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products rally, fuel bounces in bear marke.

text.p: NWE oil products rallied, punctuated by a bounce in fuel oil.
Gas oil gained $3 on firmer futures. Tight supply lifted low sulphur diesel premiums by around $3. Barges were quiet.
High sulphur fuel oil regained around $5 a tonne following weeks of heavy falls. High sulphur barges traded as high as $99 fob ARA.
Naphtha was steady with crude but high freight rates continued to deter deals in NWE and the Med.
Gasoline gained $4 in Eurograde barges but traders waited for the NYMEX for the next move.
